SQL.LOAD_FIRST_DEALER_BY_DEALER_GROUP:
SELECT d.dealer_id Id, d.dealer, d.dealer_name FROM elp_dealer d, elp_dealer_group g
WHERE d.dealer_group_id = g.dealer_group_id and g.dealer_group_id = :dealer_group_id and rownum = 1
SQL.GET_DEALERID_BY_CODE_AND_DEALERGROUP:
SELECT d.dealer_id Id, d.dealer, d.dealer_name FROM elp_dealer d, elp_dealer_group g
WHERE d.dealer_group_id = g.dealer_group_id and g.dealer_group_id = :dealer_group_id and d.dealer = :dealer
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT d.dealer_id, d.dealer, d.dealer_name, g.description dealer_group, c.code company_code, d.active_flag, g.code dealer_group_code FROM elp_dealer d, elp_dealer_group g, elp_company c WHERE --dynamic_in_clause and d.company_id = c.Company_id and d.dealer_group_id = g.dealer_group_id(+) --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause

SQL.GET_CONTRACT_MONTHLY_BILLING: SELECT d.dealer_id id, d.dealer code, d.dealer_name description from elp_dealer d INNER JOIN elp_company c ON c.company_id = d.company_id INNER JOIN elp_contract cont ON cont.dealer_id = d.dealer_id WHERE cont.recurring_premium_id = ( SELECT li.list_item_id FROM elp_list l, elp_list_item li WHERE l.code = 'PERIODRENEW' -- Product Item AND li.list_id = l.list_id and li.code = '1') and c.company_id in (select company_id from ELP_USER_COMPANY where user_id = HEXTORAW(:user_id)) and to_date(:today_date,'yyyymmdd') between cont.effective and cont.expiration
SQL.GET_DEALER_COVERAGES_COUNT: SELECT count(*) as Dealer_Coverages_Count from ELP_PRODUCT_CODE P, ELP_ITEM I, ELP_COVERAGE C where P.DEALER_ID =: dealer_id and P.PRODUCT_CODE_ID = I.PRODUCT_CODE_ID AND I.ITEM_ID= C.ITEM_ID
SQL.GET_DEALER_PRODUCT_CODES_COUNT: SELECT count(*) as Dealer_Product_Code_Count FROM ELP_PRODUCT_CODE where DEALER_ID = :dealer_id
SQL.GET_DEALER_CERTIFICATES_COUNT: SELECT count(*) as Dealer_Certificates_Count FROM elp_cert WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id
SQL.GET_DUPLICATE_DEALER_COUNT: SELECT count(dealer) as Dealer_Count FROM elp_dealer d, elp_company c WHERE d.dealer = :dealer and c.company_type_id = :company_type_id and d.company_id = c.Company_id and c.business_country_id = :business_country_id
SQL.GET_DEALER_COUNT_BY_CODE: SELECT count(dealer) as Dealer_Count FROM elp_dealer d WHERE d.dealer = :dealer
SQL.GET_DEALER_TYPE_ID: SELECT dealer_type_id as Dealer_Type_Id FROM elp_dealer d WHERE d.DEALER_ID = :dealer_id
SQL.CERT_ADD_ENABLED_DEALER_LIST: SELECT dealer_id id, rawtohex(d.company_id) company_id, dealer code, dealer_name description, C.CODE || ' - ' || dealer_name descriptionDual FROM ELP_DEALER d inner join elp_company c on c.company_id = d.company_id where GetYesNo(d.MANUAL_ENROLLMENT_ALLOWED_ID) = 'Y' --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.DEALER_COUNTRY: SELECT distinct c.country_id , c.code, c.description FROM ELP_dealer d , ELP_company comp, ELP_COMPANY_COUNTRY cc, ELP_COUNTRY c WHERE d.company_id = comp.company_id AND comp.company_id = cc.company_id AND cc.country_id = c.country_id AND d.dealer_id = :dealer_id ORDER BY UPPER(c.description)
SQL.GET_DEALERS_HAVING_DUPLICATE_CERTIFICATE: select count(*) as duplicate_prefix_count from (select CERTIFICATES_AUTONUMBER_PREFIX, count(nvl(CERTIFICATES_AUTONUMBER_PREFIX,'xxx')) from ELITA.elp_dealer WHERE getcodefromlistitem(CERTIFICATES_AUTONUMBER_ID) = 'Y' and company_id = :company_id --dynamic_where_clause group by CERTIFICATES_AUTONUMBER_PREFIX having count(nvl(CERTIFICATES_AUTONUMBER_PREFIX,'xxx')) > :count_level)
SQL.GET_CERT_AUTO_GEN_FLAG: select case when upper(code) = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end value from (select li.list_item_id, li.code from elp_dealer d, elp_list_item li where d.certificates_autonumber_id = li.list_item_id(+) and d.dealer_id = :dealer_id)
SQL.GET_SELECTED_COVERAGE_TYPES: select distinct LI.list_item_id id, translation description, code from elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype dcac, elp_list_item li, elp_dict_item_translation trans where dcac.dealer_id = :dealer_id and dcac.coverage_type_id = list_item_id and li.dict_item_id = trans.dict_item_id and language_id = :language_id order by upper(description)
SQL.GET_SELECTED_CLAIM_TYPES: select distinct LI.list_item_id id, translation description, code from ELP_DEALER_CLM_APROVE_CLMTYPE dcac, elp_list_item li, elp_dict_item_translation trans where dcac.dealer_id = :dealer_id and dcac.claim_type_id = list_item_id and li.dict_item_id = trans.dict_item_id and language_id = :language_id order by upper(description)
SQL.GET_AVAILABLE_COVERAGE_TYPES: Select Distinct li.list_item_id id, li.code, Dit.Translation description From Elp_Dealer D Inner Join Elp_Product_Code Pc On D.Dealer_Id = Pc.Dealer_Id Inner Join Elp_Item I On Pc.Product_Code_Id = I.Product_Code_Id Inner Join Elp_Coverage C On I.Item_Id = C.Item_Id Inner Join Elp_List_Item Li On Li.List_Item_Id = C.Coverage_Type_Id Inner Join Elp_Dict_Item_Translation Dit On Dit.Dict_Item_Id = Li.Dict_Item_Id Where dit.language_id = :language_id and D.dealer_id = :dealer_id and LI.list_item_id not in ( select dcac.coverage_type_id list_item_id from elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype dcac where dcac.dealer_id = :dealer_id ) ORDER BY UPPER(Dit.Translation)
SQL.GET_AVAILABLE_CLAIM_TYPES: SELECT LI.list_item_id id, LI.code code, D.translation description FROM ELITA.ELP_LIST L, ELITA.ELP_LIST_ITEM LI, ELITA.ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION D WHERE L.list_id = LI.list_id and L.code = 'CLTYP' and LI.dict_item_id = D.dict_item_id and language_id = :LANGUAGE_ID and LI.list_item_id not in ( select dcac.claim_type_id list_item_id from ELP_DEALER_CLM_APROVE_CLMTYPE dcac where dcac.dealer_id = :dealer_id ) ORDER BY UPPER(description)
SQL.GET_DEALER_CLAIM_TYPES: SELECT dcac.dealer_id, dcac.dealer_claim_aprove_clmtype_id, dcac.claim_type_id, li.code, d.translation description FROM elp_dealer_clm_aprove_clmtype dcac, elita.elp_list_item li, elita.elp_dict_item_translation d WHERE dcac.dealer_id = :dealer_id AND dcac.claim_type_id = li.list_item_id AND li.dict_item_id = d.dict_item_id and d.language_id = :LANGUAGE_ID ORDER by d.translation
SQL.CHECK_SKIP_ACTIVE_CLAIM: Select 1 as Skip_Check From Elp_Attribute a, Elp_Attribute_Value av,Elp_Dealer d Where a.Attribute_Id = av.Attribute_Id And d.Dealer_Id = av.Reference_Id And a.Table_Name = 'ELP_DEALER' And a.Ui_Prog_Code = 'SKIP_CLAIM_CHECK_DURING_CERT_CANCEL' And av.Attribute_Value='Y' And d.dealer_id = :dealer_id
